```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
file_name <- "products.csv"
products_df <- read_csv(file_name)
```

```{r}
products_df <- products_df|>
  mutate(Chemical = ChemicalName)

glimpse(products_df)
```

```{r}
file_name <- "chem_data.csv"
chemical_df <- read_csv(file_name)
```

```{r}
chemical_df|>
  glimpse()
```

```{r}
products_df |>
  full_join(chemical_df, by = "Chemical")
```
